Summary: Green and red steady lights maneuvering over the southwest night sky.
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 8:00 pm mountain standard time i and 5 other adults witnessed a ufo in the south-west night sky over chandler az. we were sitting in our back yard smoking a cigarette and chatting when i first saw this object that caught my eye. the lights were very bright green and red in color and they did not blink. it shot straight up in the sky at first. i didn't know what it was, it made no sound and didn't move like any normal aircraft would. the object appeared to be 5 to six times bigger than a star would be in the night sky. in guessing distance i would say it was about 500\1000 ft above the ground, hard to tell distance. it also appeared to have red and green lights that did not flash they stayed lit and changed color���from green to red and sometimes both green and red. it didn���t maneuver like a typical aircraft would. it moved in a more circular pattern sometimes and could change elevation and direction very quickly. as it maneuvered across the sky the lights changed color. they were very bright lights and it banked at speeds a normal aircraft cannot bank at. we continued to watch it in the night sky, videoing taping until it descended below the horizon. we were all in awe, amazed and curious as to what it was and excited that we were able to film it and watch the tape over and over again. attached is the actual footage that was taken!
